item.description:
公司表示，技术进步将预示着健康科学的 "世代交替"。【原文：

Tech advancements will herald “generational shift” in health science, firm says. 

】

item.title: 终极格斗锦标赛选择每日电讯报的 "Woke-Free "剃须刀品牌作为官方合作伙伴
item.description:
此次合作表明，这家综合格斗公司与保守派政治家和播客的文化契合度越来越高

。【原文：

The partnership illustrates the mixed-martial-arts company’s growing cultural alignment with conservative politicians and podcasters

】

item.title: 维塔士、StanChart 加入新的英国加密衍生品交易平台
item.description: 渣打银行（Standard Chartered Plc）和维塔金融公司（Virtu Financial Inc.【原文：Standard Chartered Plc and Virtu Financial Inc. are among large financial companies poised to join a new London-based crypto derivatives venue, as a market rally boosts the appeal of digital currencies.】

item.title: 西非作物前景恶化，可可创 7 个月新高
item.description: 可可期货创下七个多月来的最高水平，因为西非的生产前景暗淡，在库存处于历史低位的情况下威胁着全球供应。【原文：Cocoa futures hit the highest level in over seven months as West Africa’s production prospects dim, threatening global supplies at a time of historically low inventories.】

item.title: 以色列的斯莫特里奇说特朗普提供了推翻伊朗的机会
item.description: 以色列财政部长兼内部安全内阁成员贝扎莱尔-斯莫特里奇（Bezalel Smotrich）说，唐纳德-特朗普下个月的就职典礼为以色列提供了一个实现几个战略目标的机会：推翻伊朗政府、阻止巴勒斯坦建国、阻止黎巴嫩沿以色列边境重建村庄。【原文：Bezalel Smotrich, Israel’s finance minister and inner security cabinet member, said the inauguration of Donald Trump next month offers Israel a chance to pursue several strategic goals: overthrow the government of Iran, prevent the establishment of a Palestinian state, and stop the rebuilding of Lebanese villages along Israel’s border.】

item.title: 巴里克首席执行官被逮捕，马里提高了黄金矿商的风险
item.description:

The military regime is going after some of the industry’s biggest names in disputes over revenues.

】

item.title: 宏盟集团将收购 Interpublic，打造最大广告公司
item.description: 宏盟集团（Omnicom Group Inc.【原文：Omnicom Group Inc. has agreed to buy Interpublic Group in a deal that will create the largest advertising company in the world.】

item.title: 法国巴黎银行第二次为 SRT 提供支持，支持 170 亿欧元贷款
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，法国巴黎银行（BNP Paribas SA）第二次增加了与重大风险转移相关的企业贷款组合规模，这是投资者对此类交易的需求不断增长的最新迹象。【原文：BNP Paribas SA increased the size of a corporate loan portfolio linked to a significant risk transfer for a second time, according to people familiar with the matter, providing the latest sign of growing investor demand for these transactions.】

item.title: 私人信贷先锋的挣扎是市场的警示信号
item.description:
Alcentra曾经是欧洲直接借贷行业的领导者。它现在发现很难为这项业务筹集到新资金。【原文：

Alcentra was once a leader in European direct lending. It’s now finding it hard to raise new money for that business. 

】

item.title: 中国总理誓言竭尽全力扩大需求
item.description: 中国国务院总理李强承诺，中国政府将尽一切可能促进国内消费，以支持中国的经济增长。【原文：Chinese Premier Li Qiang pledged Beijing will do everything possible to boost domestic consumption in an effort to support the country’s economic growth.】

item.title: 波兰央行行长预计总统大选后将降息
item.description: 波兰政策制定者普热米斯瓦夫-利特维纽克（Przemyslaw Litwiniuk）表示，随着央行与执政党之间紧张关系的重现，波兰可能会在 7 月总统大选后降息。【原文：Poland may cut interest rates in July following a presidential election, policymaker Przemyslaw Litwiniuk said as tensions between the central bank and the ruling party resurface.】

item.title: 墨西哥降息在即，通胀放缓略低于预期
item.description: 墨西哥 11 月份总体通胀率的放缓幅度略高于预期，这增加了墨西哥央行在下周会议上连续第四次降息的可能性。【原文：Mexico’s headline inflation slowed slightly more than expected in November, boosting the odds of a fourth straight interest rate cut at the central bank’s meeting next week.】

item.title: OpenAI 以 200 美元的 ChatGPT 计划测试人工智能热情的极限
item.description: OpenAI 希望回答我们到底愿意为最好的人工智能工具支付多少钱。但首先...【原文：OpenAI is looking to answer exactly how much we’re all willing to pay for the best artificial intelligence tools around. But first...】

item.title: 民调显示：英国贸易观点倾向欧盟而非美国
item.description: 一项民意调查显示，英国人希望政府优先考虑与欧盟而非美国的贸易，因为英国正准备审查其英国脱欧协议，同时面临美国当选总统唐纳德-特朗普发动贸易战的威胁。【原文：Britons want their government to prioritize trade with the European Union over the US, according to a poll, as the UK prepares to review its Brexit deal while facing the threat of a trade war from President-elect Donald Trump.】

item.description:

item.title: 甲骨文股票因云势头而创下1999年以来最佳业绩
item.description: 甲骨文公司将迎来二十多年来业绩最好的一年，因为其一度陷入困境的云计算业务正受到客户和投资者的重视。【原文：Oracle Corp. is on track for its best year in over two decades because its once-struggling cloud business is being taken seriously by customers and investors.】

item.title: 印度任命桑杰-马尔霍特拉为新任中央银行行长
item.description: 印度任命职业官僚桑杰-马尔霍特拉（Sanjay Malhotra）为国家中央银行新行长，结束了数周以来关于谁将掌舵世界上增长最快的主要经济体货币政策的猜测。【原文：India named Sanjay Malhotra, a career bureaucrat, as the new governor of the nation’s central bank, ending weeks of speculations over who would helm monetary policy in the world’s fastest-growing major economy.】

item.title: 奥地利停止新的叙利亚庇护申请，计划驱逐出境
item.description: 奥地利政府暂停了所有正在进行的叙利亚国民的庇护申请，并将为总统巴沙尔-阿萨德政权垮台后有序遣返难民制定计划。【原文：Austria’s government suspended all ongoing asylum requests from Syrian nationals and will prepare a plan for orderly repatriations of refugees following the fall of President Bashar al-Assad’s regime.】

item.title: 中国因英伟达可能违反反垄断法而将其列为目标
item.description: 中国已对英伟达公司展开调查，怀疑这家美国芯片制造商违反了反垄断法。【原文：China has opened a probe into Nvidia Corp. over suspicions that the US chipmaker has broken anti-monopoly laws.】

item.title: 德国预计风力发电量下降，电力供应紧张
item.description: 低风力输出和寒冷天气将德国今冬的电力系统裕度降至最低，电价可能上涨。【原文：Low wind output and colder weather is pushing power system margins to the lowest this winter in Germany, with prices likely to rise.】

item.title: 阿布扎比顶级开发商认为商业地产热潮仍将持续
item.description: 阿布扎比最大的房地产开发商预计，随着大量企业的涌入，当地商业房地产的繁荣将持续下去，这将有助于阿布扎比酋长国躲避困扰全球城市的入住率下滑问题。【原文：Abu Dhabi’s biggest property developer expects the local commercial real estate boom to extend as an influx of firms continues to help the emirate dodge a slump in occupancy rates dogging cities around the world.】

item.title: 姗姗来迟的摩根士丹利分析师加入 Reddit 大军
item.description: 摩根士丹利（Morgan Stanley）的一位分析师承认，他错过了 Reddit Inc.但他认为，现在还有时间跳槽。【原文：A Morgan Stanley analyst admits he missed the boat on Reddit Inc.’s huge post-initial public offering gains. Yet he feels there’s still time to jump aboard.】

item.title: 央行将使市场持续活跃至年底
item.description: 全球最大经济体的央行即将做出一系列难以预测的决定。十国集团的九家央行将在未来两周内讨论并决定货币政策。市场对其中许多决定的结果还没有完全下定决心。在今年年底，大多数央行的降息时间都比投资者预测的要长，这意味着市场将出现波动。【原文：A run of hard-to-predict central bank decisions in the world's biggest economies is coming up. Nine Group-of-10 central banks will debate and decide monetary policy in the next two weeks. Markets haven’t fully made up their mind on the outcome for many of them. That means volatility at the end of a year in which most central banks took longer to cut interest rates than investors had forecast.】

item.title: 南非顶级机场因燃料问题面临航班延误
item.description: 在南非最繁忙的机场，航空公司无法为飞机加油，在国有航空公司的飞行员结束罢工仅两天后，再次出现航班延误的可能性又增加了。【原文：Airlines at South Africa’s busiest airport are unable to refuel their aircraft, raising the possibility of renewed delays just two days after pilots at the state-owned carrier ended a strike.】

item.title: 欧洲央行关注气候有助于提高公众信任度，而非通胀前景
item.description: 德国联邦银行的一项研究显示，欧洲中央银行为应对气候变化挑战所做的努力正在提高人们对该机构的信任度，但并没有切实改变消费者对未来通胀的看法。【原文：The European Central Bank’s efforts to embrace the challenges of climate change are raising trust in the institution but don’t meaningfully change the way consumers think of future inflation, according to a Bundesbank study.】

item.title: 特朗普公司计划在蓬勃发展的沙特房地产市场建造更多塔楼
item.description: 特朗普组织（Trump Organization）和奢侈品开发商 Dar Global Plc 计划在沙特阿拉伯建造两个新的奢侈品项目，以充分利用沙特阿拉伯快速增长的房地产市场。【原文：The Trump Organization and luxury developer Dar Global Plc plan to build two new luxury projects in Saudi Arabia in a bid to capitalize on the kingdom’s rapidly growing real estate market.】

item.title: 盟友称西班牙总理桑切斯应寻求信任投票
item.description: 支持佩德罗-桑切斯当选首相的一个党派表示，西班牙首相佩德罗-桑切斯应寻求议会的信任投票。【原文：Spanish Prime Minister Pedro Sanchez should seek a vote of confidence in parliament, according to one of the parties that supported his election as premier.】

item.title: 特朗普无法拯救陷入困境的美国牛肉业
item.description:
甚至在共和党人即将重返华盛顿之前，该国的养牛业就已经陷入了越来越深的困境。【原文：

Even before the Republican’s upcoming return to Washington, the country’s cattle industry has been in a deepening rut.

】

item.title: 俄罗斯军方发现购买美国芯片的惊人简单方法
item.description:
彭博社查阅的一批俄罗斯内部文件揭示了普京的军队是如何不断采购美国半导体产品的。【原文：

A cache of internal Russian documents reviewed by Bloomberg reveals how Putin’s forces have been able to keep purchasing American semiconductors.

】
